definitions: the process of taking an organ or living tissue and implanting it in another part of the body or in another body

examples.text: the transplantation of donor stem cells
experts in the field of transplantations

shortDefinitions: process of taking organ or living tissue and implanting it in another part of body or in another body

definitions: the movement or transfer of someone or something to another place or situation

examples.text: the proposal seeks felling or transplantation of 468 trees
large-scale transplantation of technologies from abroad

shortDefinitions: movement or transfer of someone or something to another place or situation
